price: Dan di antara kami ada yang Islam dan ada yang menyimpang dari kebenaran. Siapa yang Islam, maka mereka itu telah memilih jalan yang lurus.
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-mus'limūna waminnā al-qāsiṭūna faman aslama fa-ulāika taḥarraw rashadan
